items.title: Corporate Package
items.description:
_All Packages Include_

5 Hour Event Time, Two Hour Access Window Prior to Event Start, Customized Room Setup, Choice of White or Ivory Linens for all Tables, Selection of Napkin Color(s), All China, Glassware & Flatware, Complimentary Parking for all Guests, and Uniformed, Professional Staff_._

_$51.50 per person_

items.title: Breakfast
items.description: 30 guest minimum. $150 fee applies if minimum is not met.

items.title: Continental Breakfast
list: Assorted Mini Danishes, Breakfast Breads & Mini Muffins
Freshly Brewed Coffee, Decaf, Iced Water, and Tazo Hot Tea – *served with biodegradable disposable ware unless otherwise requested*

items.title: Lunch
items.description: choose Served Lunch or Deli Buffet
